caption: the detective realizes he's been targeted by an assassin. To evade the threat, he pretends to be dead. However, he lets his friend in on the secret of him still being alive. To protect himself, the detective needs to retrieve an essential document but can't do it himself, so he enlists the help of others. Simultaneously, he showcases his special skills to his friend, including decryption and understanding individuals' preferences. The detective learns of an impending flight through decoding and believes this could be the solution to his problems. He confides in his friend about his real name, leading his friend to suggest using it as an alias. Their partnership solidifies as they tackle challenges together, with the detective unveiling an important piece of mail. Together, they make plans to intercept a flight at the airport, where the detective further demonstrates his unique abilities
